Col 1

### Data set de iris
```{r Data}
knitr::kable(iris %>% sample_n(50))
```

Col 2 {.tabset}
-------------------------

### Sepal with Width by Species
```{r}
iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

### Histograma
```{r}
iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Width,
             y = ..density..,
             color = Species)) + 
  geom_histogram() +
  geom_density() +
  facet_wrap(.~Species)
```
